trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som abstrakt basisklasse for validering Kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The BaseValidator class provides the core implementation for all validation controls.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BaseValidator gir kjerner implementeringen for alle validering-Kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control.
trans-unit.target: Validering Kontroller brukes til å validere brukerinndata i den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren angir en verdi som ikke validering, viser validerings-kontrollen en feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi en validering kontroll er skilt fra inndataene kontrollen, kan du plassere feilmeldingen hvor som helst på siden i forhold til inndata kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir flere validering Kontroller som utfører bestemte typer validering.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes these controls.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver disse kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: |Validation control|Description| |------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>|Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName>.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>|Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>|Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>|Validates a value using a regular expression.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>|Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server.
trans-unit.target: | Validering kontrollen | Beskrivelse | |------------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>| Validerer en verdi mot verdien som er angitt i en annen inndata kontroll mot en konstant verdi eller mot en riktig datatype ved å angi egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>| Validerer en verdi med en gitt egendefinert validering rutine. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>| Validerer om en verdi er i et verdiområde. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>| Validerer en verdi ved hjelp av et vanlig uttrykk. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>| Validerer at en verdi ble angitt i et obligatorisk felt. | Validering Kontroller validere alltid den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client.
trans-unit.target: Validering Kontroller har også fullført klientsiden implementering som tillater skript-aktiverte nettlesere (for eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer versjon 4.0 og nyere) til å utføre validering på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: Validering forbedrer valideringen ved å kontrollere brukerinndata før den sendes til serveren.

trans-unit.source: This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation.
trans-unit.target: Dette tillater at det ble oppdaget på klienten før skjemaet sendes, unngå tur-retur av informasjonen som kreves for serverside validering.

trans-unit.source: Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria.
trans-unit.target: Flere validering Kontroller kan brukes med én enkelt inndata kontroll til å validere ulike kriterier.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke flere validering Kontroller på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> control to ensure that the value entered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is within a set range, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control to ensure that the user enters a value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>kontrollen Kontroller at verdien som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>kontrollen er innenfor et angitt område, og en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>kontrollen for å sikre at brukeren angir en verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir mange kontroller som har mulighet til å legge inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når en av disse kontrollene har den `CausesValidation` -egenskapen satt til `true`, valideringen utføres når kontrollen legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Følgende kontroller har mulighet til å legge inn på serveren:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > noen av disse kontrollene post-tilbake til serveren bare når den `AutoPostBack` er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller hver har en `ValidationGroup` egenskapen som Hvis du velger, validerer bare kontroller validering i den angitte gruppen når kontrollen utløser en på serveren.

trans-unit.source: To group validation controls, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A> property of each validation control to the same value.
trans-unit.target: Å gruppere validering Kontroller må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A>for hver verdi validering av samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: To associate an input control with a validation control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte en kontroll som inndata til en validering kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du angir teksten som skal vises i en kontroll for validering under valideringen mislykkes, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også vise et sammendrag av alle kontroller som ikke kan valideres på denne siden ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi teksten som skal vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property without setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property is also displayed in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskap uten innstillingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>egenskapen, verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen vises på validering-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker validerer kontroller, bør du alltid kontrollere resultatene av serversiden validering før du utfører en behandling.

trans-unit.source: After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Etter en sende tilbake men før hendelsesmetoder kalles, siden kaller validerer kontrollene og samler resultatene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: (You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns `true` before processing input.
trans-unit.target: (Du kan også kalle validerer kontrollene eksplisitt ved hjelp av den `Validate` metoden.) I egen koden, må du kontrollere som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>returnerer `true` før behandling av inndataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in server code before processing validated data.
trans-unit.target: Selv om skript-aktiverte nettlesere kan forhindre en tilbakesending på klienten Hvis en validering av mislyktes, bør du alltid også kontrollere <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i server-kode før behandle data som er godkjent.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also manually perform validation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også manuelt utføre validering.

trans-unit.source: To validate all validation controls on the page, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: For å validere alle validering vises på siden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Individual validation controls can be validated by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller individuelle validering kan valideres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>metoden kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap i en `Page_Load` , du må først eksplisitt metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Because validation occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName> event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not updated until the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Fordi validering skjer etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen for side, men før hendelsesbehandlingen for den `Click` eller `Command` hendelser, den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er ikke oppdatert før den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du plassere koden i hendelsesbehandlingen for den `Click` eller `Command` hendelsen i stedet for den `Page_Load` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Not all Web server controls support validation controls.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle webkontroller for serveren støtter validering Kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > For an input control to be validated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute must be applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard kontrollene kan valideres med en validering kontroll er:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > For den angitte kontrollen godkjennes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>attributtet må brukes for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you use validator controls that derive from BaseValidator inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du bruker validerer kontroller som er avledet fra BaseValidator i en <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll, må du kontrollere at validerer kontrollen og den er knyttet til kontrollen er i samme panel.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontrollere for delvis siden oppdateringer, kan du se [delvis siden gjengivelse oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når valideringen mislykkes, kan du angi fokus på den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of BaseValidator, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av BaseValidator, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not called directly.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles ikke direkte.

trans-unit.source: Validation controls that inherit from this class can call this constructor from their own constructors to initialize the base properties.
trans-unit.target: Validering Kontroller som arver fra denne klassen kan kalle denne konstruktøren fra sine egne brukes til å initialisere egenskaper base.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ForeColor%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ForeColor%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: HTML-attributter og stiler som skal gjengis for kontrollen til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAttributesToRender brukes til å gjengi attributtene for kontrollen i HTML-koden for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for a control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vanligvis overstyres av kontrollutviklere i avledede klasser å sette inn riktig attributtene og stiler til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>utdata dataflyten for en kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The CheckControlValidationProperty method is a helper method used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A> method to verify whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CheckControlValidationProperty er en helper primært ved bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A>metode for å bekrefte om den angitte kontrollen på siden og inneholder Valideringsegenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a value to report the result.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer ikke en verdi for å rapportere resultatet.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it throws an exception when verification fails.
trans-unit.target: I stedet, oppstår det et unntak når kontrollen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.target: Kontrollen for å bekrefte.

trans-unit.target: Ekstra tekst for å beskrive kilden for unntaket, hvis det et unntak fra ved hjelp av denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> property is a valid control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollen angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>egenskapen er en gyldig kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: The ControlPropertiesValid method is a helper method used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property contains a valid input control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ControlPropertiesValid er en helper brukes først og fremst ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>til å fastslå om det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>egenskapen inneholder en ugyldig inndata kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be a valid input control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property must be set to some value and that value must be a control on the page that supports validation.
trans-unit.target: Skal være en gyldig inndata kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>egenskapen må være satt til en verdi og denne verdien må være en kontroll på siden som støtter validering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> is a valid control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>er en gyldig kontroll; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir inndata kontrollen til å validere.

trans-unit.source: Use the ControlToValidate property to specify the input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen ControlToValidate til å angi inndata kontrollen til å validere.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to the ID of an input control for all validation controls except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control, which can be left blank.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må settes til IDen til en kontroll som inndata for alle validering Kontroller unntatt de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>kontrollen, som kan være tom.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a valid input control, an exception will be thrown when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en ugyldig inndata kontroll, vil bli utløst et unntak under siden gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control.
trans-unit.target: IDen må referere til en kontroll i samme beholderen som validering-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control.
trans-unit.target: Det må være i samme side eller brukerkontrollen, eller den må være i samme mal for en organisasjonsapper kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The standard controls that can be validated are: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > For an input control to be validated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute must be applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard kontrollene som kan valideres er:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > For den angitte kontrollen godkjennes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>attributtet må brukes for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All validation controls, except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the ControlToValidate property contains no text.
trans-unit.target: Alle validering Kontroller, bortsett fra de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>kontrollere, bestod validering Hvis inndata kontrollen som er angitt av egenskapen ControlToValidate ikke inneholder tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>

trans-unit.source: If you are using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>tillatelser, klientsiden og serversiden validering-funksjoner kalles enten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>

trans-unit.source: The input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: Inndata kontrollen for å bekrefte.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the validation control can perform client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollen validering kan utføre validering.

trans-unit.source: The DetermineRenderUplevel method is a helper function that is used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A> property to determine whether the client's browser supports client script.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DetermineRenderUplevel er en helper-funksjon som brukes hovedsakelig av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>til å fastslå om klientens nettleser støtter klienten skript</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this property to return `true`, the following conditions must be true: - The browser has client script enabled.
trans-unit.target: For denne egenskapen til å returnere `true`, betingelsene nedenfor må være true:-nettleseren har støtte for klientskript.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is 1 or later.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A>-Egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>objektet som er lagret i den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er 1 eller senere.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is 1.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>-Egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>objektet som er lagret i den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er 1.2 eller nyere.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control can perform client-side validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis validering kontrollen kan utføre klientsiden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display behavior of the error message in a validation control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Vis virkemåten for feilmeldingen i en validering-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Use the Display property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen visning for å angi virkemåten for visning av feilmeldingen kontrollens validering.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different values that can be used.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser ulike verdier som kan brukes.

trans-unit.source: |Display behavior|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: | Vis virkemåte | Beskrivelse | |----------------------|-----------------| | `None`| Valideringsmeldingen er aldri innebygde. | | `Static`| Mellomrom for Valideringsmeldingen er tildelt i oppsettet for side. | | `Dynamic`| Mellomrom for Valideringsmeldingen dynamisk er lagt til i siden hvis valideringen mislykkes. | > [!NOTE] > Vis-virkemåten avhenger av om validering er utført.

trans-unit.source: If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> page directive or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A> property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis validering ikke er aktiv (fordi nettleseren ikke støtter den, eller fordi den er deaktivert ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>direktivet eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A>egenskapen), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` og `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` fungere på samme måte: feilmeldingen tar plass hvis det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: Muligheten til å tildele plass til meldingen dynamisk når det ikke vises (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) fungerer bare med validering.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Static" name="Static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Static" name="Static" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om validering på klientsiden er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Use the EnableClientScript property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EnableClientScript-egenskapen til å angi om validering på klientsiden er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Validation controls always perform validation on the server.
trans-unit.target: Validering Kontroller utføre alltid validering på serveren.

trans-unit.source: They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client.
trans-unit.target: De har også fullført klientsiden implementering som tillater DHTML-støttede nettlesere (for eksempel Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 og nyere) til å utføre validering på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: Validering forbedrer valideringen ved å kontrollere brukerinndata før den sendes til serveren.

trans-unit.source: This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation.
trans-unit.target: Dette tillater at det ble oppdaget på klienten før skjemaet sendes, unngå tur-retur av informasjonen som kreves for serverside validering.

trans-unit.source: By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien settes som standard til `true`, som aktiverer klientsiden validering om nettleseren støtter dette.

trans-unit.source: You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deaktivere validering på basis kontroll av kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig hvis dynamisk oppdatering på klienten oppretter problemer med oppsettet for siden, eller hvis du vil kjøre noen server før validering finner sted.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client-side validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis validering på klientsiden er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen validering er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Use the Enabled property to specify whether the validation control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen Enabled til å angi om kontrollen validering er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: You can disable the validation control by setting this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deaktivere validering-kontroll ved å angi denne egenskapen til `false`.

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the Enabled property to `false` will prevent validation from being performed.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller egenskapen Enabled til `false` vil hindre godkjenningen fra utført.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property to always evaluate to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Dette fører til at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>til å evaluere alltid til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Enabled property is slightly different from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Enabled er litt annerledes enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for a validation control is set to `true`, but the Enabled property is set to `false`, the validation control is still rendered for client-side validation, but in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for validering Kontroller settes til `true`, men egenskapen Enabled er satt til `false`, validering kontrollen gjengis fremdeles for validering, men deaktiverte.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then re-enable the validation control on the client by using DHTML script.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter aktivere kontrollen validering på klienten på nytt ved hjelp av DHTML skript.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis validering kontrollen er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the error message displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for feilmeldingen vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> kontrollerer når valideringen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the ErrorMessage property to specify the text to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control when validation fails for the current validation control.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollere, bruker du ErrorMessage-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollerer når valideringen mislykkes for gjeldende validering kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in the validation control itself, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du angir teksten som skal vises i selve validering kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the ErrorMessage property without setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property, the value of the ErrorMessage property is also displayed in the validation control.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsValid property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk IsValid-egenskapen for å finne ut om den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen sender validering.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because the default value of this property is `true`, it will return `true` if you query this property before validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Fordi standardverdien for denne egenskapen `true`, returneres `true` Hvis du spør egenskapen før validering er utført.

trans-unit.source: For example, this might occur if you attempt to use this property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName> event of a page.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel dette kan skje hvis du prøver å bruke denne egenskapen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IsValid property is evaluated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsValid evalueres bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method for each validation control on the page individually, or call all of them at once by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>metode for hver validering kontrollere på siden individuelt, eller ring alle samtidig ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Button controls with their `CausesValidation` property set to `true` will also call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Knappen kontrollerer med deres `CausesValidation` -egenskapen satt til `true` vil også kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to change the value of this property manually after validation has taken place.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er mulig å endre verdien for egenskapen manuelt når validering er utført.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to override the validation result, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du vil overstyre validering-resultatet om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the page is set to `true` only if the IsValid property for each validation control on the page is also set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for siden er satt til `true` Hvis egenskapen IsValid for hver validering kontroll på siden også er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: After this method calls the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method, it sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property is not already set.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metodekall base kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>metoden, den angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A>Hvis følgende betingelser er oppfylt: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen ikke er allerede angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, validator controls in ASP.NET 4 and later versions do not display errors in red.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises ikke validerer kontroller i ASP.NET 4 og nyere versjoner feil med rødt.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du styrer utseendet til validerer Kontroller [validering brukerinndata i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to quickly update the appropriate control.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar brukeren til å oppdatere den aktuelle kontrollen raskt.

trans-unit.source: If multiple validation controls fail and this property is set to `true`, the control specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property for the first validation control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere validering Kontroller mislykkes, og denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, kontrollen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>egenskapen for den første validering kontrollen får fokus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set focus on the control specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> when validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi fokus kontrollen som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>når validering mislykkes; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i kontrollen validering under valideringen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Text-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i en kontroll for validering under valideringen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også vise et sammendrag av alle kontroller som ikke kan valideres på denne siden ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi teksten som skal vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property without setting the Text property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property is also displayed in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen uten å angi egenskapen Text verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen vises på validering-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i kontrollen validering under valideringen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation on the associated input control and updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*> property.
trans-unit.target: Utfører validering av tilknyttede inndata kontrollen og oppdateringer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*>

trans-unit.source: Use the Validate method to perform validation on the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden Valider til å utføre validering på den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to programmatically perform validation on the input control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan du utføre programmatisk validering på inndata kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property is automatically updated with the validation results.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>egenskapen blir automatisk oppdatert med valideringsresultatene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på valideringsgruppen kontrollen validering tilhører.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir mange kontroller som har mulighet til å legge inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server.
trans-unit.target: Når en av disse kontrollene har den `CausesValidation` -egenskapen satt til `true`, valideringen utføres når kontrollen legger til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Følgende kontroller har mulighet til å legge inn på serveren:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > noen av disse kontrollene post-tilbake til serveren bare når den `AutoPostBack` er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller hver har en `ValidationGroup` egenskapen som Hvis du velger, validerer bare kontroller validering i den angitte gruppen når kontrollen utløser en på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to assign a validation control to a validation group.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidationGroup-egenskapen til å tilordne en validering kontroll til en valideringsgruppe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class also exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A> method and a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method that accept a ValidationGroup input parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>klasse også viser en <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A>metoden og en <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>metode som godtar en ValidationGroup inndataparameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på valideringsgruppen kontrollen validering tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.
